name: Cellfish (afonsom20)
description:
Remade, remastered, reinvented!

The original Cellfish was made in GameMaker Studio 2 back in 2019, and it was my first original game. It certainly had (many) flaws, but, to this day, I still find it fun to play. So, I decided to team up with a couple of wonderful friends to remake the game, and we ended up adding a ton of awesome features and improvements.

However, the core gameplay is still the same, and the original description still holds up:

Cellfish is a fast-paced game where you play as a cell and try to survive as many waves of incoming bacteria as possible. New features

This time around, you can take advantage of the same power-ups as before, as well as one new one. We also added a new enemy type, as well as a tough (and quite annoying) boss battle!

Cellfish now features an updated score system, and an in-game online leaderboard to keep track of the best players. 

Make sure to download the game to play it to its full potential! A few features, including the leaderboard, are only available on the Windows version, not on the Web version.

Local co-op multiplayer

The game can be played in singleplayer mode, but also in a local co-op multiplayer mode. One player uses the keyboard & mouse, while the other takes a PS4/Xbox One controller. You'll have to work together to survive the ensuing pandemonium! 

Credits
  • Afonso Mota - Programming & Game Design, with Unity
  • Ivo Duarte - Art, with Krita
  • João Pereira - Music
